history.post: I was so dissapointed that I could not get back home to watch his incredible program, does anyone know when it will be rescheduled? Am I the only one who does not have a programable TV recording machine? The Technology of today is phenomonal, the subject matter is so intreaguing, I was so looking forward to having the privilage of time to watch this program, it just has to be rescheduled for the likes of me? Kindest regards Paddy.
